item.title: Always Assume They're Cheating
item.description: You’ve probably heard that the Democrat Iowa Caucuses were a humiliating and laugh-out-loud disaster. Apparently, the same idiots who built the Obamacare website (aka Harvard) also built a voting app for the caucuses. Like Obamacare, the app didn’t work. At least, that’s the official story. But it’s never uncharitble to presume the Democrats are cheating. Because Democrats are cheaters by nature and practice. The nightmare scenario for Democrats is Bernie Sanders.
